Moo::RigidSkinBumpVertex

Moo::RigidSkinBumpVertex Class Reference

This class represents a non-skinned vertex, for a normal-mapped surface. More...

Detailed Description

This class represents a non-skinned vertex, for a normal-mapped surface.
